name: LogisticsOS
headline: World's fastest and most optimal route optimization engine
description: LogisticsOS provides route optimization and fleet dispatching algorithms as services to let any last-mile company offer same-day and next-hour delivery. We are the creators of the route optimization engine that both FedEx and USPS are using on production today. We increase profit per delivery by 15% and optimize thousands of deliveries in seconds using 30X faster algorithms.

founders.name: Yuzhe Yan, Founder
founders.description: Hi there, I am Yuzhe. I am an algo expert and a C++ guru. Let me know how I can help.

founders.name: Tiangang Song, Founder
founders.description: Tech geek, ask me about any technologies. Also interested in many other fields like music, philosophy, psychology, physics, etc.

How LogisticsOS stands out?
#### Scalability
Scale up to 10,000+ orders with 30x faster time and 15% better quality.
[Request a demo](https://logisticsos.com/</contact-us>)
#### Feature Rich
The most flexible solver on the market, support all kinds of constraints.
[Learn more](https://logisticsos.com/</>)
#### Easy Integration
Our developer-friendly REST API easily integrates with any system.
[Check API documentation](https://logisticsos.com/</docs>)
#### Flexible Pricing
From pay-as-you-go to volume discount, keep your cost low while your business grows.
[See Pricing](https://logisticsos.com/</pricing>)
#### Lightning Fast
Optimize thousands of orders in seconds using algorithms that are 30X faster than all existing algorithms.
[Request a demo](https://logisticsos.com/</contact-us>)
#### Real Map Data
Work with real map data providers like OpenStreetMap, TomTom, and HERE maps.

generated_description:
### LogisticsOS: Revolutionizing Route Optimization

**Overview**  
Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's W21 batch, LogisticsOS is on a mission to build the world’s fastest and most optimal route optimization engine. Based in Ontario, CA, with a dedicated team of six, they've developed algorithms that empower any last-mile logistics company to provide swift delivery solutions—like same-day and next-hour delivery.

**What They Do**  
LogisticsOS specializes in route optimization and fleet dispatching. Their remarkable technology boasts a computation speed that is 30 times faster than traditional algorithms and can optimize thousands of deliveries in mere seconds. Notably, their solutions currently power services used by industry giants like FedEx and USPS, driving down delivery costs by an impressive 15%.

**Key Features**  
- **Scalability:** Handle over 10,000 orders with enhanced quality.
- **Feature-Rich:** Flexible solutions that support various operational constraints.
- **Easy Integration:** A REST API that seamlessly fits into any existing system.
- **Flexible Pricing:** Options range from pay-as-you-go to volume discounts, ensuring affordability as businesses expand.
- **Lightning Fast:** Real-time optimization capabilities using effective algorithms paired with accurate map data from providers like OpenStreetMap and TomTom.

**Use Cases**  
LogisticsOS is not just about speed; it’s about enhancing operational efficiency at scale. For delivery companies, this means fewer drivers, reduced travel time, and lower distances—which ultimately cut costs. E-commerce businesses can quickly batch orders, allowing for faster same-day services. Transportation Management Systems (TMS) benefit from increased order handling capabilities, making entry into competitive markets easier.

**Testimonials**  
Clients rave about the insights and quick solutions provided by LogisticsOS. Brian McIntosh, General Manager of A&B Courier, highlights the astonishing 60X faster response times achieved with their setup. As for Mathieu Brémond from Stuart, he notes the flexible solver that adapts well across various operational models in different countries.

**Conclusion**  
In a world where timely deliveries can make or break a business, LogisticsOS stands out as a powerful ally. With a fair pricing model, robust features, and client-centric innovations, they're turning logistics into a smooth, scalable operation. If you’re ready to optimize your delivery processes, check out their website at [LogisticsOS](https://logisticsos.com) and consider requesting a demo today!
